text: Callista is a genus of saltwater clams, marine, bivalve molluscs in the family Veneridae, the venus clams. ==Species== Species within the genus Callista include:Biolib * Callista bardwelli Clench & Mclean, 1936 * Callista brevisiphonata Carpenter, 1865 * Callista chinensis Holten, 1802 * Callista chione (Linnaeus, 1758) * Callista costata Dillwyn, 1817 * Callista erycina Linnaeus, 1758 * Callista eucymata Dall, 1890 * Callista florida Lamarck, 1818 * Callista grata Deshayes, 1853 * Callista impar Lamarck, 1818 * Callista maculata (Linnaeus, 1758) * Callista multiradiata Sowerby, 1851 * Callista phasianella Deshayes, 1854 * Callista pilsbryi Habe, 1960 * Callista planatella Lamarck, 1818 * Callista politissima Kuroda, 1945 * Callista roscida Gould, 1861 * Callista semisulcata Sowerby, 1851 * Callista squalida Sowerby, 1835 ; Extinct species * †Callista elegans Lamarck 1806Mémoires sur les fossiles des environs de Paris. JB Lamarck - Annales du Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle, 1806 \- Age range: 48.6 to 40.4 Ma, found only at Falunière de Grignon (Eocene of France) == References == == External links == * Category:Veneridae Category:Bivalve genera
title: Callista (bivalve)
